ComicInfo.Summary:
Tales for the bold. Ideas for the strange. Ulises Farinas, Erick Freitas, and a cavalcade of new talents bring to life amazing fantastical tales: Founding father Ben Franklin fighting legendary dragons! A man discovers his dog's secret life! A boy finds the ultimate wish fulfillment! And a tale of a long-lost friend coming back...for revenge!
ContentsBen Franklin, Dragon HunterGiant Laser RifleFishbone1935*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ulises Farinas | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kiel West | 2 | Note: The digital edition (3/9/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.

ComicInfo.Inker: Austin Breed, Derick Skuds McKinley Jones, Job Yamen, Ulises Fariñas, Zoe Crockett
